featured.text: The donkey was so much weighed down by the wet sand that he could hardly get out of the stream.
Perfectly clear ice blocks weighing 140 kg and measuring 100 cm × 50 cm
The largest one, named “Emmanuel,” weighs over 13 tons.
A giant weta can grow to over three inches long and weigh as much as 1.5 ounces.
The researchers collected more than 500 yellow-bellied sea snakes and weighed them.

other.text: In Samoa a woman is not considered attractive unless she weighs more than 200 pounds.

definition.zh_def: 測量物體的重量或質量。
definition.en_def: To measure the weight or mass of an object.
definition.example: I need to weigh the ingredients before baking the cake.
